title: Separating or divorcing: what you need to do
description: Ending a relationship and agreeing on money and property, child arrangements (sometimes known as 'custody', 'residence' or 'contact') and child maintenance

mainstream_browse_pages.description: Includes getting married abroad, decree absolutes and looking after children
mainstream_browse_pages.title: Marriage, civil partnership and divorce

meets_user_needs.title: As a person who has been married or is in a civil partnership, I need to apply for a divorce or dissolve my civil partnership, so that I am no longer married or in a civil partnership (103580)

details.benefit: I am no longer married or in a civil partnership
details.goal: apply for a divorce or dissolve my civil partnership
justifications: The government is legally obliged to provide it
It's inherent to a person's or an organisation's rights and obligations
It's something that people can do or it's something people need to know before they can do something that's regulated by/related to government
met_when: knows how to apply for a divorce or dissolve their civil partnerships
knows the court fees for making an application
knows they can arrange their own divorce without a court hearing
knows what organisations can provide support
details.role: person who has been married or is in a civil partnership
